en.title: How Much Does It Cost to Own a Cat? Monthly and Annual Expenses Explained
en.content:
Before getting a cat, it's important to understand the actual costs involved. Here's a detailed breakdown of initial expenses and ongoing monthly and annual maintenance costs.

Initial Setup Costs

ItemEstimated Cost
Cage5,000 - 20,000 yen
Litter box + litter3,000 - 5,000 yen
Cat tree5,000 - 15,000 yen
Carrier bag3,000 - 8,000 yen
Food and water dishes1,000 - 3,000 yen
Scratching post500 - 3,000 yen
Total17,500 - 54,000 yen

Monthly Fixed Costs

ItemMonthly Estimate
Cat food3,000 - 6,000 yen
Cat litter1,000 - 2,000 yen
Pet insurance1,500 - 3,500 yen
Treats500 - 1,000 yen
Total6,000 - 12,500 yen

Annual Variable Costs

ItemAnnual Estimate
Regular checkups5,000 - 15,000 yen
Vaccinations5,000 - 8,000 yen
Toys and consumables5,000 - 15,000 yen
Unexpected medical expenses0 - several hundred thousand yen

The average cost of cat ownership is approximately 10,000 yen per month, or about 150,000 to 200,000 yen per year. Be sure to consider pet insurance to prepare for unexpected medical expenses.

zh.title: 养猫费用详解：每月花多少钱？年度费用明细
zh.content:
养猫之前，了解实际花费非常重要。以下按项目详细介绍初期费用和每月、每年的维护费用。

初期费用参考

项目费用参考
猫笼5,000～20,000日元
猫厕所+猫砂3,000～5,000日元
猫爬架5,000～15,000日元
外出包3,000～8,000日元
食碗·水碗1,000～3,000日元
猫抓板500～3,000日元
合计17,500～54,000日元

每月固定费用

项目每月参考
猫粮3,000～6,000日元
猫砂1,000～2,000日元
宠物保险1,500～3,500日元
零食500～1,000日元
合计6,000～12,500日元

年度浮动费用

项目年度参考
定期体检5,000～15,000日元
疫苗接种5,000～8,000日元
玩具·消耗品5,000～15,000日元
突发医疗费0～数十万日元

平均每月约1万日元，每年约15～20万日元是一般的养猫费用。当然，建议考虑购买宠物保险以应对突发医疗支出。
